org.gradoop.flink.model.impl.operators.grouping.functions.aggregation

Interface Aggregator<IN>

  • Type Parameters:
    IN - input type for the specific aggregation function
    All Superinterfaces:
    Serializable
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    BaseAggregator, CountAggregator, MaxAggregator, MinAggregator, PropertyValueAggregator, SumAggregator

    public interface Aggregator<IN>
extends Serializable
    Defines an aggregate function that can be applied on vertex and edge groups during Grouping.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void aggregate(IN value)
      Adds the given value to the aggregate.
      PropertyValue getAggregate()
      Returns the final aggregate.
      String getAggregatePropertyKey()
      Returns the property key, which is used to store the final aggregate value (e.g.
      String getPropertyKey()
      Returns the key of the property which is being aggregated (e.g.
      void resetAggregate()
      Resets the internal aggregate value.

    • Method Detail

      • aggregate

        void aggregate(IN value)
        Adds the given value to the aggregate.
        Parameters:
        value - value to aggregate

      • getAggregate

        PropertyValue getAggregate()
        Returns the final aggregate.
        Returns:
        aggregate

      • getPropertyKey

        String getPropertyKey()
        Returns the key of the property which is being aggregated (e.g. age, price)
        Returns:
        property key of the value to be aggregated

      • getAggregatePropertyKey

        String getAggregatePropertyKey()
        Returns the property key, which is used to store the final aggregate value (e.g. COUNT, AVG(age), ...)
        Returns:
        property key to store the resulting aggregate value

      • resetAggregate

        void resetAggregate()
        Resets the internal aggregate value.
